question: Your neighbour has written to you to complain about the noise from your house. Write a letter to your neighbour. In your letter • explain the reasons for the noise • offer your neighbour an apology • tell them what initiative you will take
text: I am writing to you in response to your letter about the noise from my house that is causing disturbance to you.

The storm that happened two nights ago caused holes on the roof of my house. Since then, whenever it rains, there are leaks in my kitchen, in my bedroom and also in my living room. Therefore, I have to urgently get the carpenters to fix the roof.

Please accept my sincere apologies for the loud sounds coming out from this repair work. I really have no choice but to carry out the renovation. I hope to seek your kind understanding on this matter.

Although the renovation is supposed to end next Tuesday, I will ask for more manpower from the vendor to quickly finish it latest by the day after tomorrow. It will end the work 3 days earlier. I hope that you are satisfied with this solution.
